languages.text: {n}Удар, угодивший между пластин доспеха, застает Маражая врасплох и заставляет его потерять равновесие. В следующее мгновение Синисториа словно испаряется со своего места и оказывается рядом — ведьминский клинок со свистом рубит воздух и перебивает Маражаю позвоночник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Удар, угодивший между пластин доспеха, застает дракона врасплох и заставляет его потерять равновесие. В следующее мгновение Синисториа словно испаряется со своего места и оказывается рядом — ведьминский клинок со свистор рубит воздух и перебивает Маражаю позвоночник.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Удар, угодивший между пластин доспеха, застает Маражая врасплох и заставляет его потерять равновесие. В следующее мгновение Синисториа словно испаряется со своего места и оказывается рядом — ведьминский клинок со свистом рубит воздух и перебивает Маражаю позвоночник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose balance. In the next instant Sinisthoria appears to evaporate from her seat and reappears next to you, the Witchblade slicing though the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

{n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose balance. In the next instant Sinisthoria appears to evaporate from her seat and reappears next to you, the Witchblade slicing though the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

{n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

{n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

{n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Treffer, der zwischen die Platten von Marazhais Rüstung gezielt wurde, überrumpelt ihn. Er verliert das Gleichgewicht. Im nächsten Augenblick verschwindet Sinisthoria von ihrer Position und taucht neben dir wieder auf. Ihre Hekatari-Klinge durchschneidet die Luft und rammt sich in Marazhais Rückgrat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Treffer, der zwischen die Platten von Marazhais Rüstung gezielt wurde, überrumpelt ihn. Er verliert das Gleichgewicht. Im nächsten Augenblick verschwindet Sinisthoria von ihrer Position und taucht neben dir wieder auf. Ihre Hekatari-Klinge durchschneidet die Luft und rammt sich in Marazhais Rückgrat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你瞄准玛拉斋盔甲的缝隙，猛地一击让他猝不及防，失去了平衡。在这之后，希斯索莉亚的身影立刻消失不见，随即出现在你身边。她的巫灵刀刃在空中飞舞，切开了玛拉斋的脊柱。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你瞄准玛拉斋盔甲的缝隙，猛地一击让他猝不及防，失去了平衡。在这之后，希斯索莉亚的身影立刻消失不见，随即出现在你身边。她的巫灵刀刃在空中飞舞，切开了玛拉斋的脊柱。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai reçoit un coup entre les plaques de son armure. Surpris, il perd l'équilibre. Aussitôt, Sinisthoria se volatilise avant de réapparaître à côté de vous. Sa lame de Céraste fend l'air pour trancher la colonne vertébrale de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai reçoit un coup entre les plaques de son armure. Surpris, il perd l'équilibre. Aussitôt, Sinisthoria se volatilise avant de réapparaître à côté de vous. Sa lame de Céraste fend l'air pour trancher la colonne vertébrale de Marazhai.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un golpe entre las placas de la armadura de Marazhai lo atrapa por sorpresa y le hace perder el equilibrio. En un instante, Sinisthoria desaparece de su posición y aparece a tu lado, cortando con su hoja bruja el aire y el espinazo de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un golpe entre las placas de la armadura de Marazhai lo atrapa por sorpresa y le hace perder el equilibrio. En un instante, Sinisthoria desaparece de su posición y aparece a tu lado, cortando con su hoja bruja el aire y el espinazo de Marazhai.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの鎧のプレートの間を狙った一撃は、油断しているとことを捉えて彼のバランスを崩す。次の瞬間、シニストリアがいた場所から消えたと思ったらあなたのすぐ隣に現れる。ウィッチの刃が空を切ってマラズハイの背中を引き裂く。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの鎧のプレートの間を狙った一撃は、油断しているとことを捉えて彼のバランスを崩す。次の瞬間、シニストリアがいた場所から消えたと思ったらあなたのすぐ隣に現れる。ウィッチの刃が空を切ってマラズハイの背中を引き裂く。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zırhındaki plakaların arasını hedefleyen bir darbe Marazhai'ı hazırlıksız yakalıyor ve dengesini kaybetmesine neden oluyor. Hemen ardından Sinisthoria durduğu yerden kayboluyor ve senin yanında beliriyor. Viç'in kılıcı havayı kesiyor ve Marazhai'ın omurgasını ikiye bölüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A blow aimed between the plates of Marazhai's armour catches him off guard and causes him to lose his balance. In the next instant, Sinisthoria vanishes from her position and reappears next to you, her Wych's blade slicing through the air and cleaving Marazhai's backbone.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zırhındaki plakaların arasını hedefleyen bir darbe Marazhai'ı hazırlıksız yakalıyor ve dengesini kaybetmesine neden oluyor. Hemen ardından Sinisthoria durduğu yerden kayboluyor ve senin yanında beliriyor. Viç'in kılıcı havayı kesiyor ve Marazhai'ın omurgasını ikiye bölüyor.{/n}
